explains: adj. 无价值的，没用处的；不中用的，品质差的

sentences.en: He dismissed the opinion polls as worthless.
sentences.cn: 他认为民意测验毫无用处而不予考虑。

sentences.en: Training is worthless unless there is proof that it works.
sentences.cn: 训练并无价值，除非证明其有效。

sentences.en: Critics say his paintings are worthless.
sentences.cn: 批评家说他的画毫无价值。
